remarks: When the subspace region is not a subset of the base of the topology, the resulting set is the same as the subspace restricted to the base. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)
statement:
restin.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
restin $p |- ( ( J e. V /\ A e. W ) -> ( J |`t A ) = ( J |`t ( A i^i X ) ) ) $.
